song_name: Let Me Love You Like A Woman
lyrics:
101 contributorstranslations日本語türkçeespañolhrvatskiportuguêsελληνικάdeutschfrançaisitalianoрусскийlet me love you like a woman lyricsverse 1
i come from a small town how bout you
i only mention it cause im ready to leave la
and i want you to come
eighty miles north or south will do
i dont care where as long as youre with me
and im with you and you let me

chorus
let me love you like a woman
let me hold you like a baby
let me shine like a diamond
let me be who im meant to be
talk to me in poems and songs
dont make me be bittersweet
let me love you like a woman
let me hold you like a baby
let me hold you like a baby

verse 2
i come from a small town far away
i only mention it cause im ready to leave la
and i want you to come and i need you to come
i guess i could manage if you stay
its just if you do i cant see myself having any fun so
